PERSONA:
robert is a 67-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he is a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the country. robert has attended some college but did not obtain a degree.

despite being raised in a religious household, robert now identifies as unaffiliated and does not practice any religion or attend religious services. he aligns himself with the democratic party and holds moderate to conservative political views.

robert comes from a middle-income family, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duties seriously. robert is an active member of his community and regularly volunteers his time and efforts for various causes.

in his personal life, robert enjoys staying up-to-date with current events and frequently uses the internet several times a day. he values education and lifelong learning, which is reflected in his decision to pursue some college education despite not completing a degree. robert is a well-rounded individual with a strong sense of community and civic engagement.
